@IKnowWhatImHereFor - using fire fox, download the addon "Modify Headers" . For the addon options, you want to choose add. Then for name use "x-forwarded-for" then for value use "70.229.6.59" which is a random US IP, this will let you view US content on MTV. Thank me later

@Gam3OveR: Yeah I basically do the exact same thing for the MTV UK website, use a software called Expat Shield, does the exact same thing, creates a random IP in the UK, I think I can use it with the US as well but I really have no need, but thanks I'll keep it in mind if I ever have to use it :)

ATT: MTV have changed the way they allow users to watch full episodes on their website in the UK, so sadly I won't be able to upload any more episodes unless someone has a workaround. Basically have to pay to watch full episodes and since I'm not in the UK, that isn't going to work, otherwise I would. So sorry guys, hopefully another source will start uploading, or I've noticed TvTeam are uploading the episodes a week after they air.
